text: As a medical doctor, it is my duty to evaluate the situation with as much data as I can gather and as much expertise as I have and as much experience as I have to determine whether or not the wish of the patient is medically justified.
author: Jack Kevorkian

text: Time is generally the best doctor.
author: Ovid

text: My doctor gave me six months to live, but when I couldn't pay the bill he gave me six months more.
author: Walter Matthau

text: When I told my doctor I couldn't afford an operation, he offered to touch-up my X-rays.
author: Henny Youngman

text: The great secret of doctors, known only to their wives, but still hidden from the public, is that most things get better by themselves most things, in fact, are better in the morning.
author: Lewis Thomas
